options.title: --debug
options.description: print warnings about invalid input

options.title: -d, --delimiter=X
options.description: use X instead of whitespace for field delimiter

options.title: -d, --delimiter=X
options.description: use X instead of whitespace for field delimiter

options.title: --field=FIELDS
options.description:
replace the numbers in these input fields (default=1); see FIELDS
    below

options.title: --format=FORMAT
options.description: use printf style floating-point FORMAT; see FORMAT below for details

options.title: --from=UNIT
options.description: auto-scale input numbers to UNITs; default is 'none'; see UNIT below

options.title: --from-unit=N
options.description: specify the input unit size (instead of the default 1)

options.title: --grouping
options.description:
use locale-defined grouping of digits, e.g. 1,000,000 (which means it has
      no effect in the C/POSIX locale)

options.title: --header[=N]
options.description:
print (without converting) the first N header lines; N defaults to 1 if
      not specified

options.title: --invalid=MODE
options.description:
failure mode for invalid numbers: MODE can be: abort (default), fail,
      warn, ignore

options.title: --padding=N
options.description:
pad the output to N characters; positive N will right-align; negative N
      will left-align; padding is ignored if the output is wider than N; the
      default is to automatically pad if a whitespace is found

options.title: --round=METHOD
options.description:
use METHOD for rounding when scaling; METHOD can be: up, down, from-zero
      (default), towards-zero, nearest

options.title: --suffix=SUFFIX
options.description:
add SUFFIX to output numbers, and accept optional SUFFIX in input
    numbers

options.title: --to=UNIT
options.description: auto-scale output numbers to UNITs; see UNIT below

options.title: --to-unit=N
options.description: the output unit size (instead of the default 1)

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit

options.title: -M
options.description: from first to M'th field (inclusive)
